name: Buddhhu veroo
wishText: Hope all your birthday wishes come true! (▀̿Ĺ̯▀̿ ̿)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you! Many many happy ...
text2: Sab koi yehi karte he sir.
text3: I also wanted to do kang those text. But then
text4: I realised that it's useless for a dumbu like
